body_html: I'm confused, why are you creating a variable to store the result of the concatenation of other variables? Why not just use partitioned_variable.as_tensor() which returns a tensor with the concatenated value of all the partitions?
body_text: I'm confused, why are you creating a variable to store the result of the concatenation of other variables? Why not just use partitioned_variable.as_tensor() which returns a tensor with the concatenated value of all the partitions?
body: I'm confused, why are you creating a variable to store the result of the concatenation of other variables? Why not just use partitioned_variable.as_tensor() which returns a tensor with the concatenated value of all the partitions?
